lines.text:
[feeding monkeys]
Hey, take it easy, you guys! I'll bring you bananas every day!
Do you miss your Grandad?

He found me in the forest when I was just a baby. He brought me up, educated me and thought me kung-fu. And now, he's disappeared. I don't even know if he's alive. He's all I have in this whole world.
[after getting punched by Monkey Boy]

It hurts, you know!... I've been king of this land for years, and nobody's ever hit me! Let me tell you, it feels like I got hit by a cow and two goats, plus three horses!... Run away! Or I'll come and eat you alive, you know! Go on, run!
[after nearly getting run over by Zebrata and Maililia]
Hey, did you buy your license? Stupid jerks! What are they doing here, riding in funny trucks like that, and not directly as well?... They're headed in the same direction as me!
Are you really a girl?
Have you never seen a woman before?
one's boys, and the other are girls! So you must be the other kind of people, right?
Yes! A boy and girl, apart from physical differences, are basically the same.
Oh, yeah, I remember he said that a girl's chest is bigger than a boy's. Hey, can I take a look?
Hey, you can't touch me!
My grandpa said that too, he said a boy mustn't touch a girl. He said that those who do are called...
RAPISTS!
Oh, no...
Hey, what's wrong?
I saw a couple of trucks moving on, and those people were mean and nasty! They were headed towards your house!
So what if they were going there?
I think those people were after your Dragon Pearl! Your granddad could be in danger!
Will they kill Granddad?
It's possible!
Someone told me your kung-fu is very nice... and he wants to challenge you! If he beats you, then he'll be famous!
So someone wants to challenge me... Who is he? Tell me, who is he?
He'll be here very soon...
[points at a boat carrying Monkey Boy, Seetou, Jen-Jen and Piggy]
Oh? He's coming now? Okay, I'll show him!
[Turtle Man goggles Seetou]

[drooling]
Oh, my... you're beautiful... curves in the right places... what a beautiful figure! Oh, my whole body's itching, I'm itchy, well, here, and itchy there...
[starts scratching himself]
I'm itching all over for you!
[Roshi summons the Nimbus]
What is that?
You're stupid!
You know, do you?
It's his magic cloud!
people who are dishonest and have an impure mind, will never be able to get on it!
So then, you can sit on it?
ME?... Of course I can! I'll show you now!
[jumps on the Nimbus]
See that? I'm an honest man! My mind is pure too! That's why I'm able to get on this cloud! Right, go! Move it! Fly!
[the Nimbus throws him off]
Goddamn you lazybones, how dare you make a fool out of me in front of a pretty girl!
You lie to him, and frame me? I'll teach you!
I had a very good father and mother, and we lived in a peaceful village. But the baddies destroyed it, because of the Dragon Pearl!
Dragon Pearl?
Bad guys? Who are these guys?

The leader is a terrible monster. He kept hundreds of mean cyborgs. They killed everyone in the village and then they blew up the village! My father, in order to protect the Dragon Pearl, stayed behind and was killed too. My mother went back for my father, and then she was killed! The monster took our Dragon Pearl; it turns out he also owns a Dragon Pearl. Both my parents are dead. My home is destroyed. I've been wandering on my own since then. I have nowhere to go.
Seetou, could these be the same people who stole my Dragon Pearl?
It's got to be! So then, they took the Pearl from Jen's village, and now they've stolen Monkey Boy's Pearl too! That means they have three Dragon Pearls now! And I have one Pearl...

[cackles]
My pretty little lady, do you want to have this Dragon Pearl?
[holds out his own Pearl]
If you're willing to part with it, of course I'll take it!
I'm gonna let you have it, but... uh... you have to do something for it!
So what do you want?
I've been living on this remote island for all my life, and I've never seen a girl as pretty as you! So I... so I... well... I want... I want to see you without any clothes on!
How dare you, you dirty old man! How can you think of something as low as that?
Master, that's too much!
Hey, kid, sex is human nature!
Why should he see your body, huh? You deserve to reserve it for me!
Magic cloud, you can go home now! When I need you I'll call you, okay?
[the Nimbus dissipates into OK letters and vanishes]

Goddamn you! Goddamn you, son of a jerkball! I've treated you for so many years! When I served you, I had to toss for hours to please you! But now you jump when he tells you to jump and fly when he tells you to fly, you jerk? Why do you treat me like this? You got that, fouled-up bitch?
[Piggy bumps his head]
You're dumb, just like a pig!
Give me the Pearl, or I'll kill him!
Don't give it to him, if you do we all die! Go!
Master, please give him the Pearl, or he'll kill Grandpa! Please!
But your grandpa's right, if I give him the Dragon Pearl we'll all die anyway!

[chasing Jen-Jen]
You're a pretty girl. I want you to be my wife!
I don't want to marry you, you're too ugly! Anyway I'm too young to be married!
Never mind! I'll keep you till you grow up! When you're grown up, then you can marry me!
No! Get away from me!
Either you'll marry me, or I'll eat you up!
[Monkey Boy and Piggy are shot at by a stranger]
Who are you?
This is my master Mr Westwood! And me, I'm Miss Snow White!

[to Monkey Boy]
He's the bandit of the West! His kung-fu's good, and this is his territory! He'll kill you, unless he takes all your money!
I'm glad you know. So leave your valuables! Then I'll spare your lives!
Oh, no... You got money?
What's money?
Oh God... Hey, your kung-fu's good. So you can beat him?
Of course I can!

[to Westwood]
We got money, but you can't have it, so there!
Then I'll send you to hell!
[starts shooting]
Westwood, can I become your friend?
[Westwood screams and scrams]
What's wrong with him?
This is the first time I've seen a man who's so excited about me!

[flies after Westwood]
Master, wait! Wait!
Monkey Boy, there are seven Pearls!
Seven?
Didn't you know that?
No, I didn't. Grandpa said I must protect it. He never mentioned to me there were seven Pearls.

There are seven altogether, and there's a secret about them! It's said when the seven Pearls are put together, the sky will open up and a huge dragon will appear. When you see him, you can make a wish, and ask for anything!
Is that true?
I've heard that before! That must be the reason that evil monster steals the Pearls!
That must be it! That evil monster... we must try and stop him! He can't succeed!
But that monster is too powerful for us! We'll need to get us some help! My mother told me to go to the Turtle Man! Only he can kill the monster!
[At a hidden spot, Westwood digs up a Dragon Pearl]
I got this a long time ago. I never knew it was so powerful. I'll get all seven of them, and make a wish!
Master, do you want to rule the seven seas and be king of the world?
I'm not interested in that! I don't want to be a king!
Then you can make a wish to the dragon, and ask him to give you all the money in the world! Then you can be the richest man!
I don't need money, and I don't want fame and I don't want fortune! I want the dragon to give me courage, so I don't shiver in front of women. I don't want fear.
I don't understand that.
Magic cloud!
[the Nimbus appears in the sky and Roshi leaps on it]

[jumps on the cloud]
Magic cloud, now I order you to take me to the four corners of the world and find me pretty girls! Hah! Come on!... Hey, lazybones, don't wanna move, do ya? GO!
[the Nimbus takes off... sweeping the Turtle Man out from under it]
You idiot! I'll get you for this!
[an attack from Zebrata obliterates Roshi's home]
JESUS! How dare you blow up my house like that!
Grandpa! Grandpa, what's up?
My boy, I don't care about my own life. But this Pearl is very important. We can't lose it!
Grandpa, tell me what's going on. Why do you suddenly talk like this? I won't let anyone hurt you, and I'll safeguard the Pearl!
Granddad, with this magic pole, I can protect you and the Pearl from any invaders!
Grandpa, I'll let you attack me!
[Monkey Boy goes out hunting]
Hey! The day before yesterday we had a tiger, and yesterday was lion. So, my boy, what are you thinking of giving me today, then?
Elephant!
Huh? That may be too tough for my teeth.
Okay, how about some fish?
Fine! What kind of fish?
Crocodile!
You're different from me!
Of course we're different! You're a boy, and I'm a girl!

[to Monkey Boy]
He's a monster!
Little boy, keep out of this! Don't you know that this girl is my bride-to-be?
Bride? Hey, what's a bride-to-be?
You silly boy, don't you even know that?
My Grandpa says all evil must DIE!
Hey, don't touch my Pearl!
Is that Pearl yours?
Of course it's mine, my father gave it to me!
I've got one at home too!
Huh? Do you really? Mine has five stars, how many stars does yours have?
It's got four!
WOW! I FOUND IT! I FOUND IT! YAY, I FOUND IT!
Where's Grandpa?

[crying]
He's disappeared...
Seetou, tell me where these people are!
I've never seen them before, they're all dressed in a funny way!
Where do we find them?
Well, they came from the West, they're probably heading back there!
[Monkey Boy flies off]
HEY!
That was dirty! You fight dirty! You're no gentleman!
Oooooh, but you're a sneaky little thief! You want to steal my magic cloud! You asked for this!
Hey, look here! I don't even know you! Why would I want to fight you?
So what do you think of my magic cloud, then?
Not bad! It's obedient!
Hmmmm. But it's not obedient with me, though... You lazybones, you're no good! Ah, you're no use! I'll give you away, to HIM!
You have a Dragon Pearl?
Yes, I have a Five-Star Pearl!
My granddad had one too, but the baddies stole it from him!
My home had one too, and the baddies stole it from us!
Now these baddies have three Pearls, and they're trying to find the other four Pearls! We heard that your kung-fu was good, and we came to ask you to help us stop the evil monsters!

[goes on her knees]
They destroyed our village! Master, please help us stop these evil people!

Get up, there's no need for that! Don't you worry! That monster may have three Pearls, but they're no good unless you get all seven of them together, you know that? And without me, he'll never be able to achieve what he wants!
Why's that?
Because I have in my possession a Two-Star Dragon Pearl! Without it, how can he get what he wants, eh?
[presents it]
[Westwood tries to escape]
Westwood, without my permission, you can't leave this island no matter how hard you try!
Sir, I'm very good at kissing asses, you know that? I can make you feel very special!
I don't like people kissing my ass.
I know magic! I can change into other things, and if you're bored, I can change into ANYTHING!
I just can't resist pretty girls like YOU! I just can't control myself!
[chases Jen Jen and Seetou]
All right, I'm going now!
[changes into a bat and flies off]
You won't get away!
[chases him]
[after running from Seetou]

[to Ms Snow White]
I'm tough! I'm afraid of nothing... except for women! I have a phobia about women. I'm all shaken in front of them. How can I achieve big things?
Master, whose kung-fu is better, you or that Monkey Boy?
I'm not finished with him! I'm gonna go back and find him!
[Westwood hands over his Pearl]
A Six-Star Pearl. Oh, thank you!
[Seetou kisses Westwood, who falls over in shock]
Aah, what a useless boy! Useless youngsters! I would give my life, to have a girl kiss me!
Hey, I've got an idea...

[to Piggy]
You strip for him!
HUH? ME strip for HIM? If I took off all my clothes, he wouldn't want to look even if I paid him!
I mean that you change into me. Then he'll think he's looking at me, when he's actually looking at you!
That's great? Did you hear that?
Huh? You want ME to bare all for that sex maniac?... Okay, but you gotta pay too!
What do YOU want?
Well, he'll see the top... I'll see the bottom!
Listen, Piggy, when you change into me, you'll be able to see the whole body.
Oh, yeah! How come I'm so stupid? I'll change right now!

[about the Turtle Man]
He's a real master of magic, and his kung-fu's the best there is! But... he's a sex maniac. He's many times worse than me!
Why didn't you tell us you had a Pearl?
My teacher told me not to tell anyone!
Where is your teacher?
Oh, he's very famous! Everybody knows him, including every dog, and even every cat, because...

[knocks his head]
Just say it!

The Pig Fairy! My teacher said if I showed the Pearl, people would steal it! He said I must find you guys! That's why I used Jade to meet up with you! I think, now the time is right, so I showed the Pearl to you!
Give me the Pearl if you wish to stay alive!
Come and get it, if you can!

[having Sparkle as a hostage]
Stay where you are! Come any closer and he dies!
Master, I'm begging you, please help my grandpa!
So, you want to keep the Dragon Pearl? Then he dies!
[kicks Sparkle]

[about King Horn's Dragon Pearls]
I suspect they're inside his stomach...
Hmm...
Turtle Man, are you thinking of getting that Dragon Pearl inside his stomach, too?
Right! When the seven Pearls mix, he'll explode!
Jade, make your wish now!
Dragon, I want my home and my village restored, no more monsters, and to bring back peace to us!
I see. Your wish is granted!
[first lines]
[a village meeting starts]

This Dragon Pearl is a treasure in our village. It has been with us for over one hundred years now. It was watched over us, and brought us peace and prosperity. And right now, I am going to hand it over to our new village chief!
Who are you?
I'm King Horn! I want the Dragon Pearl!
The Dragon Pearl belongs to us, you can't have it!

[laughs]
I always get what I want! Nobody has been able to stop me!

Altogether, there are only seven Dragon Pearls... and now I already possess two of them! Now, when I finally get all of the seven Pearls together, a light will explode right in the middle of Heaven. Then the magic dragon will appear, and when that happens, the whole of the heavens and even the whole universe will be under my control!
My lord, so where are the other five Pearls?

I don't know exactly where they are, but we'll find them. One thing I do know is that one of them may well be in the East. I have heard that deep inside a forest there lives a man by the name of Sparkle. Rumor has it that he possesses a four-star Dragon Pearl. Maililia, Zebrata! I want you to go get that Pearl for me!

[copying Seetou's voice]
Westwood, can I become your friend? Can I?
That girl! That girl! Where, where is she?... I see. It was you, wasn't it? Come here!
The Dragon Pearl and the magic pole are precious family treasures! We can't let them be stolen from us!
[sparring]
Let it go! You've lost!
Forget it! I haven't lost yet!
You haven't lost yet? So you want more!

[after an attack from Maililia]
Wow, that blondie is fierce!
[Monkey Boy and Seetou ride an elephant]

[to Monkey Boy]
You know, you're clever. If you hadn't gotten me these wheels, we wouldn't have come this far!
You haven't eaten anything. Come, have some beef jerky! It's very tasty... How do you make this beef jerky?
This is not beef!
Oh? Then what is it?
It's pepper-minted gecko!
[Seetou screams]
Oh, now you've changed into a fatty!
This is my original form! I'm the 91st descendant of the Pig Fairy, sir! They call me the Pig-Headed Wizard!
The Pig Fairy? Well, I'm the 91st descendant of the Monkey King!
Oh, so that explains the pole... your ancestor and my ancestor were brothers, so that makes US brothers!
[a shadowy form flaps around]
What's that?

[looks around]
What am I doing HERE? Brother, let's go! Hurry!
Monkey Boy, who is this?
This is Westwood!
Wow, he's so good-looking!
[Westwood backs away fearfully]
What? You call THAT good-looking?... How about this!
[knocks out Westwood with one punch]
What did you do that for?
But then, why'd Westwood tell me one of you wanted to fight me?
WESTWOOD?

[seeing Turtle Man dance]
He must have magic in those shorts!
[Piggy disguises himself as Seetou]
Darling...
So, have you made a decision yet?

[seductively]
Oh, yes I have...
Come here!
[Roshi lets out a whoop and starts to dance with Seetou]
[dazed after seeing Seetou topless]
She's so sexy... she's just incredible... I've never been so crazy about a girl... she's wonderful! I've finally really lived!
[a turtle shell is seen floating on the water]
Master!
Master!
Master, you're still alive!

[wading out of the ocean, half-naked]
Are you kidding? Nobody can get rid of ME that easily!... But still, my house is destroyed, and my Dragon Pearl stolen! These people will not get away with this!
Westwood, why are you following us?
Don't forget, one of those Dragon Pearls you lost belonged to me in the first place. I have a right to look for it too, you know!
Good! You're welcome to join our group!
So, then, every one of us here all have a relationship with a Dragon Pearl, is that right?
[everyone agrees]

[to Piggy]
Hey, you don't!
Uh... you're right! I don't have a Dragon Pearl, I've no relationship with it...
Now we own the last Pearl that monster needs... let's go get him!
Turtle shot!
I'LL KILL HIM!
You are all only granted one wish, so what do you wish for? You must tell me now!
[last lines]
I have a wish...
Yes, what is it?
I want to challenge you to a fight!
Well, your wish is granted!
[they charge at each other]
Go for it, Monkey Boy! Go for it, Westwood!
